tools.title: json-server
tools.description: Fake REST API based on a json schema. Useful for mocking and creating APIs for front-end devs to consume in coding challenges.

tools.title: fastify
tools.description: Extremely fast and simple, low-overhead web framework for NodeJS. Supports HTTP2.

tools.title: YUP
tools.description: Yup is a JavaScript object schema validator and object parser. The API and style is stolen heavily inspired by Joi, which is an amazing library but is generally too large and difficult to package for use in a browser. Yup is leaner
